# UITabBarDelegate

**Protocol**

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBarDelegate] protocol defines optional methods for a delegate of a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar] object. The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar] class provides the ability for the user to reorder, remove, and add items to the tab bar; this process is referred to as customizing the tab bar. The tab bar delegate receives messages when customizing occurs.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UITabBarDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Send [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/beginCustomizingItems(_:)] to a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar] object to begin customizing. Implement the methods in Customizing tab bars to intervene while a user is customizing a tab bar. The customizing modal view is dismissed when the user taps the Done button on the modal view.

## Customizing tab bars

- **tabBar(_:willBeginCustomizing:)**: Sent to the delegate before the customizing modal view is displayed.
- **tabBar(_:didBeginCustomizing:)**: Sent to the delegate after the customizing modal view is displayed.
- **tabBar(_:willEndCustomizing:changed:)**: Sent to the delegate before the customizing modal view is dismissed.
- **tabBar(_:didEndCustomizing:changed:)**: Sent to the delegate after the customizing modal view is dismissed.
- **tabBar(_:didSelect:)**: Sent to the delegate when the user selects a tab bar item.

## Customizing the tab bar behavior

- **delegate**: The tab bar’s delegate object.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- UITabBarController

items.description: Sent to the delegate before the customizing modal view is displayed.
items.name: tabBar(_:willBeginCustomizing:)

items.description: Sent to the delegate after the customizing modal view is displayed.
items.name: tabBar(_:didBeginCustomizing:)

items.description: Sent to the delegate before the customizing modal view is dismissed.
items.name: tabBar(_:willEndCustomizing:changed:)

items.description: Sent to the delegate after the customizing modal view is dismissed.
items.name: tabBar(_:didEndCustomizing:changed:)

items.description: Sent to the delegate when the user selects a tab bar item.
items.name: tabBar(_:didSelect:)
